name: Carving Pumpkin
description:
Story

You don't know why are you here, but somethings related to carving a pumpkin is the only thing you can do. Can you survive?

How to

- Clicked the highlight shape to carved the pumpkin.
- Survive for 60 seconds.

Install

Download, unzip, and play

Information

Hi there, thank you so much to come and try my game, this is my first game jam. Didn't have much time to work on it because of work, but this is what i can came up with for One Minute Game jam #8. Feedback is very much appreciated.
